projects.title: Wheedu
projects.description: Wheedu is a brand new community collaboration platform dedicated to revolutionizing the way communities work together. Wheedu aims to remove the need for spreadsheets, email and phone lists to empower organizers to run their organizations easily and effectively. Wheedu features both a Web and Mobile environment.

projects.title: Metroidvania - HTML5 multiplayer game

projects.description: Find new styles, mix them, then shop! www.fashionmix.com is the hottest new way to amp up your wardrobe and connect with friends.
